text: Ernest D. Preate, Jr. (born November 22, 1940) is a former Republican politician. He was the Pennsylvania Attorney General from 1989 to 1995. In 1995, Preate went to jail after pleading guilty to mail fraud charges. ==References== Category:Pennsylvania attorneys general Category:Living people Category:1940 births Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Scranton, Pennsylvania Category:Criminals from Pennsylvania
title: Ernie Preate
